Name: Fresh Martini
Ingredients: 7.5 ml Giffard Menthe Pastille white crème de menthe
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Review: The perfect digestif Martini. Mastiha and white crème de menthe - both renowned for their digestive properties - add cooling freshness to this wet, lightly sweetened Martini.
History: Created 19th April 2015 by yours truly at the Cabinet Room, London, England. See: Martini Cocktail and its evolution
Nutrition: One serving of Fresh Martini contains 200 calories
